TopicTitle: Mute KSP sound and music when in background or minimized?

Articles.Content: Hi All, is there setting somewhere that mutes KSP when it's in the background or minimized? I checked both main menu settings and in-game settings and no joy.

2 hours ago, ClamBoy said:

Hi All, is there setting somewhere that mutes KSP when it's in the background or minimized?

Not that I know of. You would just have to go to your volume mixer or whatever controls the volume on your computer and turn KSP's off. Then you would have to turn it back on when going back into the game.

There is a mod I use called Music Mute, which is not exactly what you're asking for but it's pretty handy when you're minimizing or when you just want to listen to your own music. It only mutes the music, though, but there probably won't be much other sound when you've got the game paused.
